about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a vibrant world overflowing with color and charm as you traverse mountainous woodlands to rejoin with your other half. Seek the aid of the forest as flowers and deer pick you up and carry you along on your journey.



  • Beautiful natural environments
As you traverse the world, you’ll experience the likes of windy savannas, waterfall caves, primordial jungles, and more! Every environment comes with its own hand-crafted artwork, each as breathtaking as the last.

  • Relaxing, easy-to-pick-up gameplay

Trot, jump, and throw as you make your way through the forest. Whether you’re looking for a more casual experience or are new to games, Split Spirit offers gameplay where you can enjoy the world without having to worry about losing or complicated controls.

  • Simple physics-based throwing mechanics
Toss yourself from the deer and flowers that aid your journey. Aiming is assisted with a visible throw arc to help you make trickier shots and there is no penalty for missing - the flower or deer you last threw from will happily pick you back up again so you can try again!



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
